chesttracker.title: Chest Tracker
chesttracker.gui.memorySelector.title: Load or create Memory Bank
chesttracker.gui.memorySelector.search: Search or create a Memory Bank
chesttracker.gui.memorySelector.newMemor: Enter a valid, not existing Memory Bank name.
chesttracker.config.gui.autofocusSearchB: Whether to automatically focus the search bar when the GUI is opened.
chesttracker.config.gui.memoryKeyIcons.d: Defines how the buttons for the Memory Keys are labelled. Supports NBT (through the config file). The order of this list defines in what order they show up in.
chesttracker.config.memory.irreversable: Warning: this action can not be undone.
chesttracker.config.memory.global.autoLo: Whether to automatically load Memory Banks on game load, creating an ID from world name / server IP / Realm ID. Disable to always need to select manually. You can always change the loaded Memory Bank in-game.
chesttracker.config.memory.global.readab: Whether the JSON files in the memory directory should be readable, or compacted.
chesttracker.config.memory.global.storag: Defines how Memory Banks are stored between worlds/sessions.
Stores all Memory Banks as JSON files in your game's 'chesttracker' directory.
Stores Memory Banks in game memory.
Warning: all Memory Banks stored this way are lost when the game closes.
chesttracker.config.memory.local.title: Loaded: %s
Delete all keys from the selected Memory Bank.
chesttracker.config.memory.local.deleteK: Delete the key %s from the selected Memory Bank.
chesttracker.config.whereisit.tooltip: Open Where Is It's config; go here to change highlight rendering.
